game.name: Princess Elsa Halloween Night
game.description:
The entire country is celebrating Halloween today! Your favorite Disney princess Elsa has also invited her friends and enjoyed the celebration together. Lots of things they have to do before attending the Halloween ball. Do you help your favorite princess Elsa to handle the situation with ease? Join Princess Elsa Halloween Night game and be prepared to take care of all the tasks the cute Disney princess has planned to celebrate this spooky holiday! Complete the previous task to unlock the next one!
Three most important things you have to do include helping Elsa to prepare a card for her friends, divining his love and assisting the girl to pick up a perfect outfit for the tonight party. Firstly, use all the four options to prepare a Halloween card in this one of the best girls games! Then go to the next step and divine his boyfriend as fast as you can. Use the third step to dress up Elsa with a combination of elegant outfits in this brand new dressing game for girls! 
Give her a dark green dress opening at the bottom side, or a short white and dark grey color outfit or a short red color frock! Choose a matching hairstyle and combine her look with a spooky accessory on her head and a nice jewelry in this html5 princess dress up game! Do not forget to choose a scary accessory and give it to her hand. She loves to carry a pair of matching sandals. When you are done, click the next button and allow Elsa to join the Halloween ball with her friends.
